column5: Has Anyone fished Redhorse Lake near Voyagers...Canada side. Off of Sandpoint Lake?Thanks

I don't know of a Redhorse lake. i know on the north east of Sandpoint there is a Redhorse bay. fishing there is mainly for bass and pike. you may run into the random walleye over there. but i have found them in the deeper water, of the main lake schooled up waiting to come into the shallows to eat.
